channel.title: snowcrash on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in snowcrash on My blog

item.title: Snowcrash - Level00
item.description: on connection to level00, we arrive on a empty home directory An interesting file because we don’t have any file present in the home directory, we search for file related to the user flag00 our target. first we search for with flag00 as owner $ find / -user flag00 2>/dev/null /usr/sbin/john /rofs/usr/sbin/john Cesar, my old friend The file /usr/sbin/john contain a odd string but its not our password. The filename john refer to a tool to find weak passwords of your users.

item.title: Snowcrash
item.description: Introduction Snowcrash is a VM in the style of a CTF. You have 14 level to complete and get each flags Summary Level00: you lost something ? Level01 Level02 Level03 Level04 Level05 Level06 Level07 Level08 Level09 Level10 Level11 Level12 Level13 Level14
